locations.name: River Test, Hampshire
locations.description: A legendary chalk stream known for its crystal-clear waters and discerning trout

locations.name: River Itchen, Hampshire
locations.description: Another famous Hampshire chalk stream with a reputation for large, educated trout

locations.name: River Nadder, Wiltshire
locations.description: A picturesque Wiltshire river flowing through ancient water meadows

locations.name: Bewl Water, Kent
locations.description: A large reservoir offering boat and bank fishing in beautiful Kent countryside

locations.name: Chew Valley Lake, Somerset
locations.description: A renowned stillwater fishery in the Mendip Hills, famous for large trout

locations.name: River Kennet, Berkshire
locations.description: A classic chalk stream with gin-clear water and selective trout
